scripts.watch:others: concurrently "yarn dto watch" "yarn utilities watch" "yarn types watch" -n dto,utilities,types -c red,green,yellow
scripts.serve: concurrently "yarn client serve" "yarn server start:dev" "yarn watch:others" -n client,server,"watch:others" -c cyan,magenta,blue --handle-input --default-input-target server
scripts.build:others: yarn types build && yarn utilities build && yarn dto build
scripts.build: yarn build:others && yarn client build && yarn server build
